description: Comprehensive Git MCP server enabling native git tools including clone, commit, worktree, & more.

MCP_LOG_LEVEL.description: Sets the minimum log level for output (e.g., 'debug', 'info', 'warn').

GIT_BASE_DIR.description: Optional absolute path to restrict all git operations to a specific directory tree. Provides security sandboxing for multi-tenant or shared environments.

MCP_HTTP_HOST.description: The hostname for the HTTP server.

MCP_HTTP_PORT.description: The port to run the HTTP server on.

MCP_HTTP_ENDPOINT_PATH.description: The endpoint path for the MCP server.
